mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND enabled = 1
SELECT r.role_code FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.permission_code FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.permission_code IS NOT NULL
